"use strict";
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
const utils_1 = require("./utils");
var PromiseState;
(function (PromiseState) {
    PromiseState[PromiseState["Pending"] = 0] = "Pending";
    PromiseState[PromiseState["Resolved"] = 1] = "Resolved";
    PromiseState[PromiseState["Rejected"] = 2] = "Rejected";
})(PromiseState || (PromiseState = {}));
;
class SyncPromise {
    constructor(code) {
        this.resolvers = [];
        this.rejectors = [];
        this.state = PromiseState.Pending;
        code(t => this.resolve(t), r => this.reject(r));
    }
    static Resolve(t) {
        return new SyncPromise(resolve => resolve(t));
    }
    then(onfulfilled, onrejected) {
        this.catch(onrejected);
        if (!onfulfilled)
            return new SyncPromise(utils_1.noop);
        if (this.state === PromiseState.Pending)
            return this.getResolvePromise(onfulfilled);
        else
            return this.afterResponse(onfulfilled(this.resolveValue));
    }
    catch(onrejected) {
        if (!onrejected)
            return new SyncPromise(utils_1.noop);
        if (this.state === PromiseState.Pending)
            return this.getRejectPromise(onrejected);
        else
            return this.afterResponse((onrejected(this.rejectReason)));
    }
    toString() {
        return '';
    }
    getResolvePromise(onfulfilled) {
        return new SyncPromise((resolve, _) => {
            this.resolvers.push(t => {
                const passVal = onfulfilled(t);
                if (passVal instanceof SyncPromise)
                    passVal.then(value => resolve(value));
                else if (passVal instanceof Promise)
                    passVal.then(value => resolve(value));
                else
                    resolve(passVal);
            });
        });
    }
    getRejectPromise(onrejected) {
        return new SyncPromise((resolve, _) => {
            this.rejectors.push(t => {
                const passVal = onrejected(t);
                if (passVal instanceof SyncPromise)
                    passVal.then(value => resolve(value));
                else if (passVal instanceof Promise)
                    passVal.then(value => resolve(value));
                else
                    resolve(passVal);
            });
        });
    }
    afterResponse(next) {
        if (next instanceof Promise || next instanceof SyncPromise)
            return next;
        return SyncPromise.Resolve(next);
    }
    checkState(newState) {
        if (this.state !== PromiseState.Pending)
            throw new PromiseResponseError('A promise can only be resolved or rejected once. ');
        this.state = newState;
    }
    resolve(t) {
        this.checkState(PromiseState.Resolved);
        this.resolveValue = t;
        for (const resolve of this.resolvers)
            resolve(t);
    }
    ;
    reject(reason) {
        this.checkState(PromiseState.Rejected);
        for (const reject of this.rejectors)
            reject(reason);
    }
    ;
}
exports.SyncPromise = SyncPromise;
class PromiseResponseError extends Error {
    constructor(message) {
        super(message);
    }
}
exports.PromiseResponseError = PromiseResponseError;
